nodes.bodyText: If you want the cookie to be invalidated, why don't you also reset the value?
Because to clear a cookie you set max age 0. The value has no effect in this case.
yes, I know. Just a bit useless to send the value over the wire IMHO.

Hi @gsmet @stuartwdouglas yes, I've seen it being suggested, for the moment I've just reused the code from Vertx and added a path, but I suppose I can set its value as empty. @lodrantl mentioned it is less obvious the cookie has been invalidated when tracing the network requests if the name remains
